definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The roads and aqueducts of Rome have been the admiration of all after ages.
sentences.chinese: 古罗马的大道和高架渠在其后的年代一直受到羡慕。

sentences.english: However, only one European site, the Colosseum, was picked for the new seven wonders.
sentences.chinese: 然而，新7大奇迹只有古罗马斗兽场一个是在欧洲。

sentences.english: At the left is a temple dedicated to the Roman emperor Hadrian.
sentences.chinese: 左边是一座纪念古罗马哈德里安大帝的庙宇。

sentences.english: From the Coliseum, Go Back Through the Gate of Constantine.
sentences.chinese: 从古罗马竞技场，往回经过君士坦丁之门。

sentences.english: The 706 Factory House is a modern version of the ancient Roman city-state.
sentences.chinese: 诺大的七零六厂房，如同现代版的古罗马城邦。

sentences.english: To the Roman's he was Cupid, and his mother was Venus.
sentences.chinese: 在古罗马神话中，他就叫做丘比特，其母是维纳斯。

sentences.english: The Jury system is stemmed from Ancient Greece and Ancient Rome, slave countries then.
sentences.chinese: 陪审制度最早源于古西腊和古罗马的奴隶制国家。

sentences.english: Cook a Polynesian feast or an ancient Roman banquet.
sentences.chinese: 做一桌波里尼西亚宴席或古罗马盛宴。

sentences.english: The manly Roman woman manager by the chfirmionship had manwismanner.
sentences.chinese: 军旗旁那位有良人风致的古罗马女经理具有良人风范。

sentences.english: The ancient Roman ampthitheatre set in modern central Amman.
sentences.chinese: 安曼现代化城区里的古罗马露天剧场。

sentences.english: Valentine's Day may come from the ancient Roman feast of Lupercalia.
sentences.chinese: 圣瓦伦丁节可能源自古罗马的牧神节。

sentences.english: In ancient Rome, yellow was the most popular wedding color.
sentences.chinese: 在古罗马，黄色是婚礼时最流行的颜色。

sentences.english: The manly Roman woman manager by the flag had manasmanner.
sentences.chinese: 军旗旁那位有良人风致的古罗马女经理具有良人风度。

sentences.english: Many conquered nations had to pay tribute to the rulers of ancient Rome.
sentences.chinese: 许多被征服的国家必须向古罗马的统治者朝贡。

sentences.english: This paper aims at a global review on the prosaic works of the knowledgeable and productive Roman author Varro.
sentences.chinese: 本文全面地评介古罗马作家瓦罗的散文作品。

sentences.english: Yesterday we visited the forum of ancient Romans.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我们参观了古罗马的公共集会广场。

pinyin: Ya4 li4 shan1 da4 Da4 di4

definition: Thebes, place name in ancient Egypt/Thebes, ancient Greek city state
Pompeii, ancient Roman town near Naples, Italy
